title: PLS RIOT MAKE SG ZOE LEGENDARY :(
body:
In all the skin lines the legendary one is villains
Odyssey --> Kayn, Zed.
Dark Stars --> Thresh, Jhin (Not Karma or Orianna)

Pls make SG Zoe legendary. Not Xayah & Rakan.

You can give them legendary skins in all the valentines days. But Zoe won't get another chance for long time.

(Sorry for bad grammar)

And the lore for Karma's skin says this:

> Karma was a galaxy-spanning civilization dedicated to pacifism and personal enlightenment, unceremoniously erased from reality and reborn as a star-consuming horror. Devouring entire galactic systems, she enforces a dread order upon the cosmos, meditating in the vast oceans of emptiness where there were once stars.

Sounds pretty evil to me.

He says she formed from a passifist star system, he's not saying that she herself is a passifist

Also Jhin is the legendary for the Cosmic line, hence the Dark Cosmic name. Thresh was already the legendary of the Dark Star.

> In all the skin lines the legendary one is villains

This literally isn't true. Leona, Master Yi, Ashe, and Pyke are all on the good guy side for their legendaries.

> You can give them legendary skins in all the valentines days. But Zoe won't get another chance for long time.

Xayah and Rakan already have valentine skins. Why would they need another? Besides, a legendary valentine skin would suck because the theme is too weak. 

> Pls make SG Zoe legendary. Not Xayah & Rakan.

Legendary SG Xayah and Rakan are already made. They aren't going anywhere. And there is 0 chance Riot will delay the Zoe skin for months just to make it a legendary. Besides, the already modeled the skin and it doesn't look like a legendary. They would almost entirely have to start from scratch.

> Xayah and Rakan already have valentine skins. Why would they need another? Besides, a legendary valentine skin would suck because the theme is too weak. 
> 

And trust me. They will get skins for valentine again.
No, they won't. They don't repeat skin themes for champions that already have skins with that theme.

No, they indeed will not. The only time any champion got a skin in the same holiday / seasonal event was when they rethemed older skins. Poppy for example has Ragdoll, originally released as a christmas skin, but when her VGU happened, it became a Toy Box skin. She was then given a proper christmas skin, Snow Fawn.

You are right. And I know skins are already made. But I just wanted reporting my idea.

And I believe Rioters reading boards. I just wanna add something to SG Zoe for make her really devil. Her  voice and interactions are like just a funny kid now. I cant think Devil Zoe with this voice and interactions xd.

I think they can add this little things until skins come to live servers.

They can't add a full voice over before it goes live. 

They have to do the following:

A. write a Script
B. Edit the script
C. Get a hold of the voice actor and schedule a session
C2: if VA is unavailable they either put idea on hold or do auditions for a new voice which adds another time span
D. Record and edit the audio
E. Place audio into game
F. Get internal feedback, as they sometimes record things that then get canned and not released (see MFs unreleased new voice over)
G. If feedback is positive enough, they then move to the pbe for at least two weeks.

This is months worth of work as recording is done at least 3-6 months before a project is released. Some voice over even takes a few years before the final project can be heard.

Plus, she doesn't include any new ability animations, so they would need to go back and modify and create new ones for her as well or it wouldn't be even near legendary.
Additionally this has to be done for every language.
Yup that as well. Which is why it can take several months for all of it to come together

um Pyke is villain for sure. He isnt the Bloodharbour Ripper because he is a nice guy.
Pyle is not the Bloodharbour Ripper in he Project Universe. In the Project Universe he fights for the rebellion against corrupt corporations and the abuse of humanity.

Yeah, no. They can't just magically make the skin a legendary. You have no idea how long it would take for them to do that.

* They'd have to get her VA back, and if they can't get her original one back, they have to find someone who sounds enough like her to replace her.


* They have to schedule the recording session, which could be a bitch to do depending on when the VA is available.


* They have to record the lines, which takes hours on its own. Then they have to decide which ones they want to use, edit them, and do all sorts of other shit.


* They'd have to completely redo the skin itself, adding new animations and the like, which takes time.

It would probably delay the release by a month, maybe a little longer depending on how much work they'd have to do.

While I feel she should have been, they aren't going to go back and do that as it would massively halt the release of the skins. It was the same thing that they already detailed over Bloodmoon Diana. They went into making the skin an Epic (1350 tier) and that's how it will stay. It takes a very long process to go back and update the skins into a different tier.
